projects.name: Bravespaces
projects.subtitle: AI-Driven Strategic Intelligence Platform (US Universities)
points: Developed an AI-powered knowledge intelligence system enabling universities to analyze internal data and plan future strategies.
Built document ingestion pipelines and custom chatbots trained on uploaded institutional data.
Designed AI-assisted modules for Vision, Mission, Strategy, and Core Values creation.
Implemented analytics dashboards for market analysis, retention, and revenue growth tracking.
Used Claude AI & ChatGPT for system design, refactoring, prompt engineering, and feature planning.

projects.name: AI Photo Manager
projects.subtitle: Album Automation Platform
points: Built an AI-powered photo management system for wedding & event photography studios.
Implemented AI logic to filter unusable photos (eye-closed, duplicates, low-quality images).
Developed automatic album layout generation and a client approval portal.
Created post-processing workflows for final editing and lab-ready exports.
